title: Unable to Launch Game
body: Everytime i try to launch league nothing happens. when i try again. i get a black screen with nothing on it. unable to log in or start the launch. is there a fix?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is unable to properly reach out login servers. Since this is often caused by incompatible network settings, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address this.

Please let me know if this fixed it.

i checked my internet and everything worked normally. i did however restart my laptop and that fixed the problem. :D 

THANKS FOR THE REPLY!
